mapper.insert: insert into lms_classContent (title, description, classID, playlistID, days, daySeq, startDate, endDate) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{classID}, #{playlistID}, #{day}, #{daySeq}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from lms_classContent where classID=#{classID} and days=#{day}
select * from lms_classContent join lms_playlist on lms_classContent.playlistID = lms_playlist.id where classID=#{classID} order by days and daySeq
